option1:
This option can be used to get a lot of informations on your PC / components.
Note that all the informations written on this option, as the IP, are NOT saved by the creator.
You can also refresh the data by pressing ENTER, which permit you to see the data in real-time without leaving. 
This is the first option of this program, the Option 1 : System Infos.
option2:
This option can be used to check if a password is secured.
It does so by having some criterias that ensure that your password is strong enough.
It can also generate a very strong random password for you, within the requirements of websites.
This is the first option of this program, the Option 2 : Password Checker.
